contacts

Class Contacts

  • java.lang.Object
    • contacts.Contacts

  • public class Contacts
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class acts as contact-archive for PKMT Tool which will be used in the first tab of PKMT
    Version:
    1.00 2018-11-14 The Base-Object
    Author:
    JSGREWAL

      • findNextEntry

        public ContactEntry findNextEntry()
        Find the next entry that contains the search string. If it finds a match, it returns a contacts entry that matches. If there is no match or there is no search string, the method returns a null
        Returns:
        a matching contacts entry or return a null

      • findAll

        public java.lang.String findAll(java.lang.String target)
        Find all of the entries that have a word that contains the search string specified by the method parameter
        Parameters:
        target - - is the String that should be used to drive the search
        Returns:
        - an empty String or a String of the sequence of entries that match the search String
